title: Who Am I?
text: I’m Ammar Aldawood, an aspiring computational biologist. A medical laboratory sciences alumnus from Jordan University of Science and Technology, I became increasingly aware of how indispensible mathematics and computation are for understanding biology.

title: Reading List
text:
This is a collection of books, papers and writings that I think are or might be particularly insightful. I read a lot more than what is listed here, but those are more deliberate readings compared to most of the reading that I do everyday, which can be quite arbitrary and hard to keep track of.












Introduction to Mathematics for Computational Biology
